 switcher (std::string s, bool &b)

Public Attributes

std::string name
bool & option

Detailed Description

The switcher is useful when configuring bools from string data.

E.g. to set bool isTrue according to a string coming from a stream: cin >> switcher("isTrue", isTrue);
